name: Melting Cube
description:
This is a prototype game made for the course Game Concepts and Design at the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria.

You play as a simple cube and have to make it to the end of the level. The catch is, you loose size and mass with every centimeter you move. You have to carefully plan where you want to go so you don't shrink into nothingness.

You control the cube by clicking on it and dragging the mouse in a specific direction to apply force to the cube.

Playing with fullscreen enabled is recommended.
